page.title: 15NATEBY &WHARTON BAND OF HOPE
page.content: FORMED 1886 NOW HAS 14 ADULTS AND 10 CHILDREN ON REGISTER.MEETINGS IN VILLAGE HALL 4TH THURSDAY SEPT., OCT., AND NOV. VISITING SPEAKERS AIM TO EDUCATE CHILDREN ABOUT THE DANGERS OF ALCOHOL,ENCOURAGING TOTAL ABSTINENCE. ALTERNATE YEARS IT HOSTS KIRKBY STEPHEN MEMBERS, ENJOYING A VISIT FROM THE EDEN VALLEY BAND OF HOPE QUEEN (ELECTED YEARLY) REFRESHMENTS ARE SERVED FOLLOWED BY GAMES AND AN OFFER- ING IS TAKEN TO DEFRAY EXPENSES.MONTH- LY COMPETITIONS ARE POPULAR - DRAWINGS OR MAKING TURNIP LANTERNS ETC. EDITH HEWITSON MEMORIAL CUPS PRESENTED YEARLY TO CHILDREN GAINING MOST POINTS DURING JUNE WE JOIN EDEN VALLEY MEMBERS AT APPLEBY MARCHING BEHIND OUR COLOURFUL BANNERS FOR A DAY OF ACT- IVITIES IN THE OPEN AIR - IT IS DEMON- STRATION DAY.ANNUALLY CHILDREN SIT THE CLEARWAY NATIONAL TEMPERANCE EXAM.
